attributes.action: Ban the practice of slaughtering unstunned animals for Halal or Kosher meat.
attributes.background: The Islamic and Jewish religions call for the slaughter of animals by slitting their throats and allowing them to bleed out. In some cases, (estimated to be around 15% in the UK ), this is carried out without the animal being stunned. This is a barbaric practice not worthy of a place in 21st C UK.
